title: 02/01/21 DPS Hour 3 Gary Klein and Kyler Murray
itunes:title: 02/01/21 DPS Hour 3 Gary Klein and Kyler Murray
description:
Gary Klein talks to Dan about how surprised he was that the Rams went for Stafford rather than Watson. Gary said that the quickness and speed of the trade was shocking. Kyler Murray talks to Dan about his visit to the show 2 years ago. Kyler tells Dan that he had given his word to play baseball and didn't want to give his decision to play football until later.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
